resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: If after the Middle Ages duels began to be prohibited, they have not disappeared. The gentlemen continued to fight to save their honor and dueling became a way of life.
resource.chars: If after the Middle Ages duels began to be prohibited, they have not disappeared. The gentlemen continued to fight to save their honor and dueling became a way of life.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The sword continued to be used in duels. However, the gun was also widely used. The person who had to save his honor had the choice of weapons.
resource.chars: The sword continued to be used in duels. However, the gun was also widely used. The person who had to save his honor had the choice of weapons.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Honor duels stopped at first blood. However, this did not prevent deaths.
resource.chars: Honor duels stopped at first blood. However, this did not prevent deaths.

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M649.60105,768.54657h112.89455v0h112.89455v180.28559v180.28559h-112.89455h-112.89455v-180.28559z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"annotation":null,"nonHoverStrokeColor":["Color",0,0.74902,1],"editable":true}" id="rectangle_4fc5f2db-635b-45e1-8465-bbb5efc0c76a" fill-opacity="0.00001" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="10.98601" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The duelists were accompanied by witnesses. They had to help the wounded and make sure the men had fought fair.
resource.chars: The duelists were accompanied by witnesses. They had to help the wounded and make sure the men had fought fair.
